title: BRIEF-Kraken Awarded $2.9 Mln Katfish Contract From Thayermahan
text:
BRIEF-Kraken Awarded $2.9 Mln Katfish Contract From Thayermahan

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 07:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Kraken Awarded $2.9 Mln Katfish Contract From Thayermahan Sept 23 (Reuters) - Kraken Robotics Inc : * KRAKEN AWARDED $2.9 MILLION KATFISH CONTRACT FROM THAYERMAHAN INC. * KRAKEN ROBOTICS INC - UNIT HAS RECEIVED PURCHASE ORDER FROM THAYERMAHAN INC., FOR A KATFISH™ 180 SYSTEM * KRAKEN ROBOTICS INC - CONTRACT VALUE IS $2.9 MILLION, WITH DELIVERY EXPECTED IN Q1, 2019 * KRAKEN ROBOTICS INC - THAYERMAHAN WILL DEPLOY KRAKEN'S KATFISH 180 AS PART OF ITS SEASCOUT® EXPEDITIONARY SYSTEM FOR SEABED MAPPING AND INTELLIGENCE

BRIEF-Kraken Awarded $2.9 Mln Katfish Contract From Thayermahan
description: BRIEF-Kraken Awarded $2.9 Mln Katfish Contract From Thayermahan
